items.sentence: There might be other alternatives we haven't thought of yet.
I want to buy a car just like the one that Tom wants to buy.

Tom translated a letter from French to English for his boss.
I guess that Tom thought that it was too late to come visit.
Tom told Mary he thought that she was behaving like a child.
